The '''obsidian boat''' was a joke [[boat]] variant included in the April Fools' snapshot [[Java Edition 15w14a]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{crafting
|A2 = Obsidian                |C2 = Obsidian
|A3 = Obsidian |B3 = Obsidian |C3 = Obsidian
|Output= Obsidian Boat
|ignoreusage=1
}}

== Usage ==
Unlike other boats, obsidian boats sink in [[water]] instead of floating and are resistant to fire and lava. This makes it somewhat prototypical of [[Strider]]s.

== Sounds ==
Obsidian boats use the "Friendly Creatures" sound category for entity-dependent sound events, although they do not have any sounds of their own.
